attributes.action: Scrap Brexit and save the planet
attributes.additional_details:
David Attenborough and Greta Thunberg have recently highlighted what the world's scientists have been telling us:
- We can no longer put off drastic action
- We have 10 years to stop irreversible change
- Hope is not enough

It is time for our politicians to forget their differences and work with other countries to solve this crisis now.

Greta explains what worries young people:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-bu2136AJUg
https://twitter.com/gretathunberg/status/1120388573449084931?s=21
attributes.background: Our children are frightened and understand the need for dramatic action in the next 10 years to avoid the nightmare of an uninhabitable Earth. This is a call for Parliament to cancel Brexit so that the UK and EU can avoid negotiating a trade deal for the next four years and focus on climate change.
